synopsis.text:
Japan's top-notch sweeper, Ryo Saeba, and his partner, Kaori Makimura, are the go-to duo for handling intricate cases in Tokyo's bustling Shinjuku Ward. With Saeba's unparalleled marksmanship and his (sometimes overbearing) penchant for women, they take on a new assignment involving Ai Shindo, a sought-after model who finds herself in a dangerous predicament.

As Ai becomes the target of mysterious assailants, Saeba and Kaori step in to protect her, only to uncover a city-wide conspiracy that reaches far beyond a simple modeling job. Ai's connection to the enigmatic president of an IT company, Shinji Mikuni, and her deceased father's hidden past propel our heroes deeper into a world of mercenaries, secret terrorist organizations, and cutting-edge weaponry.

With the stakes higher than ever, Saeba and Kaori must navigate the treacherous waters of this conspiracy while balancing their professional and personal lives. As the city's most formidable sweeper, Saeba will need to rely on his sharp instincts and unmatched skills to protect Ai and unravel the mystery that threatens to tear their lives apart. Can they uncover the truth before it's too late? Join Saeba, Kaori, and Ai in this thrilling anime adventure that will leave you on the edge of your seat!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
